backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing a campus marketplace backend with buy/sell, rental, and lost & found items, user profiles, blob storage, and role-based authorization enforcing university email membership.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend fixes to authentication/profile setup flows, gating logic, and React Query behavior to avoid loading dead-ends during login and onboarding.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of frontend files describing routing, components, hooks, styling, and recent fixes to profile gating and authentication flows.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet entry point for the frontend; content not shown here but referenced for marketplace-wide styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, page title, root mount node, and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup using TanStack Router, a shared layout with Header/Footer, ProfileSetup gate, theme provider, and route definitions for marketplace sections.
frontend/src/components/AddItemModal.tsx: Modal form for adding buy/sell, rent, or lost/found items with image uploads, validation, categorized error handling, and submission via backend blobs.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmati: Reusable confirmation dialog prompting users to confirm item deletion with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAddButto: Floating circular action button styled for the marketplace, triggering item creation flows.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright information with minimal marketplace styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main sticky site header with logo navigation, search bar, authentication actions, and responsive mobile menu. Handles Internet Identity login/signup/logout, auth intent tracking, scroll-based styling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Reusable card component for displaying marketplace items with image, pricing, metadata badges, and location. Optionally renders action buttons for contacting the seller or deleting the item.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal dialog prompting users to log in or sign up using Internet Identity. Manages auth intent, loading states, and closes automatically on successful authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Wrapper component that enforces profile creation after authentication, including name, university email validation, and saving the user profile. Handles auth intent flow, logout, and displays a welcome screen when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity using React Query. Automatically recreates the actor on identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with app-specific configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating marketplace data (user profiles, buy/sell, rentals, lost & found) via a backend actor, with centralized error formatting and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base, component, and utility layers with a detailed light/dark theme using CSS variables, plus marketplace-specific shadows, transitions, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by creating the root and wrapping App with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BuySection.tsx: Implements the Buy marketplace page with item listing, filtering, deletion for owners, network error handling, and retry UI using data from useGetBuySellItems.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Renders the landing page with a hero section, category navigation, and previews of recent buy and rental items fetched via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LostFoundSection.tsx: Provides the Lost & Found page with tabs for lost/found items, authentication and profile checks, add/delete item modals, and robust loading and network error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RentSection.tsx: React page that fetches and displays rental listings, handles network/loading states, and conditionally shows owner actions. Supports authenticated item listing and deletion with profile gating, login prompts, and confirmation modals.
frontend/src/pages/SellSection.tsx: React page for managing the authenticated user’s for-sale listings, including fetching items, adding new listings, and deleting existing ones. Enforces login and completed profile before posting, with network error handling and modals.
frontend/src/utils/authIntent.ts: Utility for persisting whether a user intended to log in or sign up across Internet Identity redirects using sessionStorage. Provides safe set, get, and clear helpers with graceful error handling.
frontend/src/utils/universityEmail.ts: Helper functions to validate that an email belongs to the @jainuniversity.ac.in domain and to return user-friendly validation error messages. Used for enforcing university-only registration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash routes and persisting them in sessionStorage. Includes helpers to store, retrieve, clear, and sanitize sensitive parameters without page reloads.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, custom color tokens via CSS variables, typography, animations, and plugins. Centralizes design system theming and layout behavior.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the project’s current direction, architecture, and implemented features. Documents Internet Computer stack decisions, authentication, RBAC, profile gating, and core marketplace functionality status.
